ctx: intros A e1 e2 k H x o H0 H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type e1, e2 : env A k : nat H : forall x : nat, x < k -> lookup x e1 = lookup x e2 x : nat o : option A H0 : x <= k H1 : nat H2 : H1 < 1 + k The term "0" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "option ?A".

original: intros A e1 e2 k H x o H0 H1. unfold agree in H. intros H2. apply (length_insert 0 (1 + k)). - simpl. rewrite H0. auto. - lia. - lia.
